constituent: discipline, person, stick, fred astaire, taskmaster, shape
koohiiStory1: Mr. T is a harsh taskmaster who will discipline you (beat you into shape) with his walking stick.
koohiiStory2: You may not have known it, but Mr. T is into discispline. Not just self discipline, in order to get into shape, but what he really likes is when the Task master spanks him with her walking stick. Don´t tell Mr. T I told you. I pity da fool, and da fool would be me!!!
readingExamples: 修飾 (しゅうしょく), 修養 (しゅうよう), 改修 (かいしゅう), 修まる (おさ.まる), 修める (おさ.める)
words: pursuit of knowledge, studying, learning, training, ascetic practice, discipline
ornamentation, embellishment, decoration, adornment, polish up (writing), modification (gram)
